nodes.text: The Loyalist Faction was a political faction within the Galactic Senate. The faction was composed of senators that were fully loyal to Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine and the expansion of his emergency war powers. The faction was strangely held together by an alliance between several idealists, the Militarist faction, and threatened Rim Worlds. Most members believed that the Galactic Republic was the only thing that ensured peace and justice in the galaxy, and that the Clone Wars were necessary to avoid a devastating collapse of the economy that was rooted in secession.
The Loyalist Faction was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
